headline: American Express (AXP): Reassessing Valuation After Record Results, Younger Card Growth and Upbeat 2025 Guidance
summary: American Express (AXP) recently supported the long term bullish narrative with record revenue and earnings, along with 3.1 million new cards skewing younger, and management reiterated its upbeat guidance for growth in 2025. See our latest analysis for American Express. The latest print seems to have kept that optimism intact, with the share price now at $362.28 and a robust year to date share price return of 21.4 percent, supported by a strong five year total shareholder return of 228.36...
